fields.title: About Us
fields.content:
Fashion is all about creating your own style, being able to shop all you want and to mix and match up your creativity. We believe that everyone is born unique and has the rights to have their own unique way to dress up. fashionment is created de to the need of fashion department in this world; where rights to shop are open to all people.

If you think you have a fashion statement to show others, have a dream to start your own line of fashion but have no fnancial or technical skills to back up you opening up a store? We are here to give you a chance to open up an electronic store, where you can satisfy your fashion craves. Fashionment is here to give you the opportunities to start your own lines of fashion, to share your unique favours to the world. What do we offer?

  • Creating an online shop for fashion enthusiast
  • Connecting to different market in different continents
  • Knowing new fashion idea and keep in touch with the fashion update
  • Having a platform for people to view, share and sell their creation of fashion
  • Increasing the fashion excitement

fields.title: Developers
fields.content:
Fashionment.com is developed by Empiria Media Indonesia (EMI), a company that conducts developments on several media channels by providing effective information distribution in a market place that benefits both buyers and sellers.

With EMI distinctive creativity and entrepreneurial spirit, we are able to explore unique segments and market information needs to build a distinctive information distribution techniques. EMI also focuses on affiliating with strategic partners to create synergies and to capitalize on market growth.

fields.title: Help
fields.content: For trouble assistance and any other enquiries, please contact our administrator at 62.21.666 021 84 or email fashionment@empiriamedia.com. All calls and emails will be received and replied during office hours, Monday to Friday, 8.30am until 5pm. Be rest-assured that we will do the best for your enjoyment and beneficial.

fields.title: Privacy Policy
fields.content:
When you register with Fashionment, you agree to deliver us your certain personal information such as your name, your email address, your telephone number, your address, your gender, and any other personal or preference information.

When you enter Fashionment, we collect your browser type and IP address. In addition, we store certain information from your browser using “cookies”. We use session ID cookies to confirm that users are logged in. These cookies are terminated once the user closes the browser. By default, we use a persistent cookie that stores your login ID (but not your password) to make it easier for you to login when you come back to Fashionment. You can remove or block this cookie using the settings in your browser if you want to disable this convenience feature. This information is gathered for all Fashionment visitors.

When you use Fashionment, you may set up your personal profile. We collect this information so that we can provide you the service and offer personalized features. When you update information, we usually keep a back-up copy of the prior version for a reasonable period of time to enable reversion to the prior version of that information.

The content that you post is at your own risk, we cannot control the actions of other users with whom you may choose to share your information. Therefore, we cannot and do not guarantee the content that you post on the site will not be viewed by unauthorized persons.

If you choose to use our invitation service to tell a friend about our site, we will ask you for information needed to send the invitation, such as your friend's email address. We will send your friend an email in your name inviting him or her to visit the site.

fields.title: Terms of Use
fields.content:
Introduction

Welcome to Fashionment.com. An online fashion shopping community that connects people for selling, buying, sharing and communicating in fashion world. By using the Fashionment website, you are agreeing about these terms and condition below. In addition, if you are an individual who wishes to become a Fashionment Member (a "Member"), sharing with other Members and make use of the Fashionment service (the "Service"), you must read this Agreement and indicate your acceptance of its terms by following the instructions on the "Sign Up" page and checking the box labeled "I agree to Fashionment’s terms of service."

Note: The Terms and Condition below which will be rules that can not be collided in Fashionment.com. Fashionment.com has authority to change Terms and Condition for any particular reasons as well as the format and content or temporary close the access to Fashionment.com website without any announcement before. That is why, we suggest you to see this Terms and Condition periodically. If you still using Fashionment.com’ services even after the administrator have changed partly or whole of content of its Terms and Condition, we will assume that you have agreed the new Terms and Condition.

  1. Eligibility: You must be sixteen or over to use the Website, register as a Member or create an online shop. Use of the Website and membership in the Service are void where prohibited. By agreeing to these terms or by using the Website, you represent and warrant that you have the right, authority and capacity to enter into this Agreement and to abide by all of the terms and conditions of this Agreement.
  2. Term. This Agreement will remain in full force and effect while you use the Website and/or are a Member. You may terminate your membership at any time for any reason. We may terminate your membership for any reason at any time. If you are using a paid version of the Service and we terminate your membership in the Service because you have breached this Agreement, you will not be entitled to any refund of unused subscription fees. Even after your membership is terminated, certain sections of this Agreement will remain in effect.

Informations

Information provided on this site is intended to be general in nature and is for your informational purposes only.  You should not rely on such information in making any decisions. Fashionment.com tries to ensure that all information provided on this site is accurate at the time it is placed on this site but does not guarantee the accuracy of the information. To the fullest extent allowed by law, all information and tools provided herein are provided “with all faults”, and “as available.” Fashionment.com does not warrant or make any representations regarding the use of or the results of the use of the material on this site or on third party sites in terms of their correctness, accuracy timelines, reliability, or otherwise, including, without limitation factory-recommended maintenance information. Fashionment.com shall not be held responsible or liable for any action or inaction you may take based on information or tools provided herein or for any damages or loss you may suffer as a result of your actions or inactions

1.     Public Profile Information. Regardless of what personal information a you choose to include in your Fashionment profile or what level of sharing of your profile you choose, " A Member's public profile is an abbreviated version of that Member's regular Fashionment profile, containing the information listed below, which will be available to any user of the Website, as well as to the general public through, for instance, search engines like Yahoo! or Google. Each individual Member's public profile includes the following information about that Member:

Profile Information

  • Name (first, or first and last, depending on which option the Member chooses)
  • Gender
  • Age
  • Location
  • Hometown
  • "Member Since" date
  • The URL of the Member's Fashioment profile

Store Profile

  • Store Name
  • Store Location
  • Store Contact Number
  • Store’s Promotion

2.     Removal of Content. You understand and agree that we may review and delete any Content that you include in your profile or otherwise Post on any area of the Website (which may include deleting your entire profile) that we, in our sole judgment, believe (1) violates this Agreement, (2) might be offensive or illegal or (3) might violate the rights of, harm or threaten the safety of any other Member

3.     Member Responsibility for Content. You are solely responsible for the Content that you Post on the Website or the Service or transmit to other Members.

4.     Prohibited Content.Below is a partial list of the kind of Content that is illegal or prohibited on the Website. Posting of any of this Content by you may result in our sole discretion in account Ban; delete account, and termination of your membership. In addition, we reserve the right to investigate and take appropriate legal action, in our sole discretion, against anyone who violates this provision, including, without limitation, removing the offending communication from the Website and reporting such violator to the appropriate legal authorities. Prohibited Content includes but is not limited to Content that, in our sole judgment:

  1.  
    1. is patently offensive to the online community, such as Content that promotes racism, bigotry, hatred or physical harm of any kind against any group or individual;
    2. harasses or advocates harassment of another person;
    3. involves the transmission of "junk mail," "chain letters," "spam" or any other unsolicited mass mailing, emailing or other communication;
    4. includes any information that (1) you know is false or misleading, (2) promotes illegal activities or conduct that is abusive or (3) is threatening, obscene, defamatory or libelous;
    5. constitutes or includes any illegal or unauthorized copy of another person's copyrighted or copyrightable work, including but not limited to, (1) pirated computer programs or links to them, (2) information which circumvents manufacturer-installed copy-protect devices, (3) pirated music, images or video or links to pirated music, image or video files or (4) Content which otherwise violates the terms of Section 8 below;
  • displays pornographic or sexually explicit material of any kind;
  • includes material that exploits people under the age of 18 in a sexual or violent manner or is intended to solicit personal information from anyone under 18;
  • provides instructional information about illegal activities such as making or buying illegal weapons, violating someone's privacy or providing or creating computer viruses;
  • solicits passwords or personally-identifying information for commercial or unlawful purposes from other Members;
  • constitutes or includes any promotion, sales or other commercial activity such as contests, sweepstakes, barter or advertising.

Even though all of the above Content is strictly prohibited, there is a small chance that you may become exposed to such items while using the Website or the Service. If so, neither we nor any of our officers, directors, employees, shareholders, advertisers or corporate partners will in any way be responsible for any damages incurred or suffered by any party or caused by any party arising out of or related to any such exposure

Additional Informations:

  1. You must use the Website and the Service in a manner consistent with any and all applicable laws and regulations.
  2. Unless you are a Member Entity who has registered a Fan Profile, you may not include in your Member profile any telephone numbers, street addresses or email addresses.
  3. Although Fashioment cannot monitor the conduct of its Members off the Website, it is a violation of this Agreement to use any information obtained from the Service or the Website in order to harass, abuse or harm another person or in order to contact, advertise to, solicit or sell to any Member without the prior explicit consent of such Member and Fashioment. To protect our Members from such conduct, we reserve the right, in Fashionment’s sole discretion at any time, to restrict the number of emails or other communications that a Member may send to other Members.

Online Store and Payment

Fashionment.com provides facility for people to have online store, with “Mail” ordering system which is available in this website. Fashionment.com provide 1000 Mail for each Online Store Account. Fashionment.com have no responsibility of Incoming “Mail” if the content of mail has reached maximum limit. Fashionment.com also has no responsibility to restore the mail that has been deleted.

Regarding the Online Store in Fashionment.com, you have right and duty for these following things:

  1. Obey all law and rules in Indonesia
  2. Not colliding the copyright and trademark of any other third party
  3. Not colliding people’s right or any other entities including right of publicity and privacy
  4. Will not deceive customer (including fake), product liability, act against the law, breaching the contract, and any crime to people or any other entities.
  5. You are solely responsible for the Content that you Post on the Online store which all rules in section 1 “Public Information” do applies in Online Store content.

Payment

All kind of transaction which is made will be taken care by each individuals and Fashionment.com will have no responsibility regarding all things happened including the crime and sort of.

Use and Intellectual Property:

This site is owned and operated by PT. Empiria Media Indonesia ("Fashionment.com") and contains material protected by copyright, trademark including links and compilations of individual data, trademarks, service marks, and other intellectual property laws. Nothing contained on this site should be construed as granting any license or right to use any mark displayed on this site without the written permission of Fashionment.com or such third party owner of any mark displayed on the site. You may download one copy of the materials from this site on one computer for your personal, noncommercial use only, provided that (a) all copyright and other proprietary notices are kept intact, (b) no modifications are made, (c) the materials are not used in a manner that suggests an association with Fashionment.com, and (d) you do not download quantities of materials to a database that can be used to avoid future downloads from this site. Your use of the marks displayed on this site and any other content on this site, except as provided in these terms and conditions, is strictly prohibited. Fashionment.com will aggressively enforce its rights to the fullest extent of the law.

By publishing, displaying or uploading (collectively, "Posting") any text, links, photos, video, messages or other data or information (collectively, "Content") on or to the Website (including on or to your profile), you automatically grant, and you represent and warrant that you have the right to grant, to Fashioment an irrevocable, perpetual, nonexclusive, fully-paid and worldwide license to use, copy, perform, display and distribute such Content and to prepare derivative works of, or incorporate into other works, such Content and to grant and authorize sublicenses of the foregoing.

External Third-Party Sites:

This site may include links and pointers to sites maintained by third parties. Neither Fashionment.com, its parent or subsidiary companies nor their affiliates controls or operates, in any respect, any products, services or information provided on these third-party sites. These links and pointers are provided to you to help find relevant sites, services, and products quickly. Fashionment.com explicitly disclaims any responsibility for the accuracy, content or availability of information found on sites that link to or from this site. Fashionment.com cannot ensure that you will be satisfied with any products or services that you purchase from a third-party site.

Disclaimers

Everything on this site is provided to you and without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. To the fullest extent permissible pursuant to applicable law, Fashionment.com disclaims all warranties, express or implied, including, but not limited to, implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose. Fashionment.com does not warrant that the functions contained in the materials on this site will be uninterrupted or error-free, that defects will be corrected, or that this site or the servers that make such materials available are free of viruses or other harmful components. We are not responsible for any incorrect or inaccurate Content Posted on the Website or in connection with the Service, whether made or caused by users of the Website, Members, our advertisers or corporate partners or by any of the equipment or programming associated with or utilized in the operation of the Website or the Service.

WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR THE CONDUCT, WHETHER ONLINE OR OFFLINE, OF ANY MEMBER OR OTHER USER OF THE WEBSITE. UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES WILL WE BE RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY LOSS, LIABILITY OR DAMAGE, INCLUDING PERSONAL INJURY OR DEATH OR PROPERY DAMAGE, RESULTING FROM OR ARISING OUT OF ANYONE'S USE OF THE WEBSITE OR THE SERVICE, ANY CONTENT POSTED ON THE WEBSITE OR TRANSMITTED TO MEMBERS OR OTHER USERS OR ANY INTERACTIONS BETWEEN OR AMONG MEMBERS OR OTHER USERS OF THE WEBSITE, WHETHER ONLINE OR OFFLINE.

We assume no responsibility for any error, omission, interruption, deletion, defect, delay in operation or transmission, communications line failure, theft or destruction or unauthorized access to or alteration of user or Member communications. We are not responsible for any problems or technical malfunction of any telephone network or lines, computer online systems, servers or providers, computer equipment, software, failure of email or players on account of technical problems or traffic congestion on the Internet or at any website or combination thereof. We are not responsible for any injury or damage to any computer equipment belonging to any user of the Website, any Member or any other person related to or resulting from use of the Website, viewing, playing or downloading any materials on or from the Website or otherwise in any way in connection with the Service. We cannot guarantee and do not promise any specific results from use of the Website or the Service. No advice or information, whether oral or written, obtained by you from us or from or through the Website or the Service shall create any warranty not expressly stated herein.
